Posts.Content: Hi all, I was just wondering if anyone has had experience of using a cold cap while having FEC-T treatment? Did it stop hair loss and to what degree?Â  At what stage in the treatment did you have hair loss? Many thanks in advance.... xx
Posts.Title: FEC-T and Cold Cap

Posts.Content: Thanks Anne, that's really helpful. I will give it a go but wanted to see how effective it is on the FEC-T programme. I'm glad it worked for you, and fingers crossed I get some good results too! Thanks! X
